title: Portfolio website
description: A personal portfolio of a web developer implemented as a SPA in React with a focus on clean design. Contains responsive sections with brief information about herself, technical skills, a list of projects with a brief description and links, and contact information.

title: Space tourism website
description: A single-page space-themed application built with React and React Router. Features multiple pages, responsive layout, and subtle animations for a polished user experience. Implemented based on the layout from Frontend Mentor.

title: Easybank landing page
description: A responsive landing page for a banking service, built based on a Frontend Mentor challenge. Focused on clean layout, modern design, and full responsiveness.

title: Restaurant website
description: A responsive restaurant website developed with a mobile-first approach. Features include menu browsing, feedback submission, and order placement. Built as part of a university coursework project.

title: Product list with cart
description: A clean and responsive landing page built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features simple animations and interactivity without any external frameworks. Implemented based on the layout from Frontend Mentor.

title: Teachinder
description: Prototype application for searching for teachers using data from the API. Dynamic filtering, searching, sorting, and adding teachers are implemented.

title: Spammer
description: A fullstack web app for sending bulk email messages. Features a Bootstrap-based UI, a Node.js + Express backend, and MongoDB for data storage. Users can manage their mailing list - add, edit, and delete email addresses - and send messages to selected recipients.

title: Fat-client
description: A full-featured web application with a React-based frontend and a RESTful backend on Node.js + Express. Includes an admin panel with authorization, secure session handling, and real-time UI updates using AJAX. Styling with Bootstrap; Postman support enabled for API testing.

title: Simple weather app
description: A weather forecast app with 5-day data from Meteosource API. Includes login authentication with input validation and cookie-based session persistence. Upon successful login, the user is redirected to /dashboard where weather data is loaded using geolocation and displayed using reusable components. Unauthorized users are redirected to the login page. Login information: email: maryna3@gmail.com; password: maryna3
